Posts.Content: Jul 11, 2018 03:55PM Saintsnow wrote: I have had an itchy scalp since starting Ibrance (with exemesthane) in September 2017 and am slowly losing hair. I recently had a biopsy of two bumps on my scalp and found out they have metastatic breast cancer cells. About 2 weeks ago I discovered a bald spot of about 1.5 inches in diameter where it does not appear the hair will grow back in at all. Does anyone have a similar situation?
Posts.Title: Itchy with Ibrance?! jnh singlemom1
